Welcome to TypeWars!
Settings available in Controls GUI (Top Right of page, higher the value, the more difficult):

  • Word Difficulty
  • Time Difficulty
  • Speed Difficulty
  • Rotation Enabled
  • Rotation Difficulty
  • Text Color
  • Text Font
  • Font Size
Displayed up there is also the score and remaining lives. You only get 3! Refresh the page to start again.
Hit enter to submit what you've typed.
Hit space bar to pause!
Hit the ? key (will work even if shift isn't pressed and it's a `/` instead) to bring this dialog back!
